mapper.insert: insert into welcome_tb (crew_id, user_id, content) values ( #{crewId}, #{userId}, #{content})
mapper.delete: delete from welcome_tb where status = '거절' and created_at < DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
mapper.select: select cw.welcome_id, cw.crew_id, cw.user_id, cw.content, cw.status, cw.created_at, ut.nickname, ut.birth_date, ut.full_name, row_number() over (partition by cw.crew_id order by cw.created_at desc) as welcome_rank from welcome_tb cw left outer join user_tb ut on (cw.user_id = ut.user_id) where cw.crew_id = #{crewId} and cw.status in ('대기중')
select welcome_id, crew_id, user_id, content from welcome_tb where crew_id = #{crewId} and user_id = #{userId}
